entry.title: Thursday: Rain or freezing rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain changing to rain near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:14 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 08:14 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
